Event.name: Studying
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Student</fen> enrolls and then remains at an <fen>Institution</fen> for the purposes of education within a <fen>Subject</fen>. They may receive instruction from a particular <fen>Teacher</fen> at the <fen>Institution</fen>. The <fen>Place</fen>, <fen>Time</fen>, and <fen>Duration</fen> of the study may also be specified.
<ex><fex name="Student">He</fex> spent ten years <t>studying</t> <fex name="Subject">physics</fex> <fex name="Institution">at the lycee</fex> before he flunked out.</ex>
</def-root>

Arg.name: Teacher
Arg.definition:
<def-root>One who instructs a <fen>Student</fen> in some area of knowledge or skill.
<ex>She <t>studied</t> <fex name="tea">from him</fex> for years.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Student
Arg.definition: <def-root>One who receives instruction from a <fen>Teacher</fen> or <fen>Institution</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Institution
Arg.definition: <def-root>An educational establishment, such as a school or college.</def-root>

Arg.name: Subject
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The area of knowledge or skill which is taught to a <fen>Student</fen>.
<ex>She <t>studies</t> <fex name="Subject">astrophysics</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Level
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Level</fen> of a <fen name="Student">student</fen> in his/her education. <ex>a <fex name="Level">graduate</fex> <fen>student</fen></ex> <ex>a <fex name="Level">fourth grade</fex> <fen>student</fen></ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition: <def-root>A state which describes the Student during the process of study.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>The manner of studying that the <fen>Student</fen> has.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>The time when the student is studying.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Place</fen> is the location within which the studying takes place.
NOTE: Consider whether a possible <fen>Place</fen> phrase is really where the training took place or is rather part of a description of the <fen>Institution</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>The amount of time for which the process of study is ongoing.</def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The reason for which the <fen>Student</fen> studies the <fen>Subject</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Co-participant
Arg.definition: <def-root>Co_participant is an entity that participates in a coordinated way in the Studying event. </def-root>

Arg.name: Intended_academic_credit
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Student</fen>'s motivation for studying.
<ex>He is <t>studying</t> <fex name="Intended_academic_credit">for his Master's</fex> .</ex></def-root>
